page.title: 19WITTERINGS REST HOMES
page.content: There are an increasing number of people,over the age of 65,living with-in the Witterings.Many live locally within their own homes,but there has been an increasing demand for retirement residences,either small flats or rest homes. The attraction for many elderly people retiring or moving into the area is the favourable climate during the Summer months,the flat nature of the terrain,and the close proximity of the services within the village of East Wittering. Groups of children visited one of our local rest homes.When visiting Seagulls Rest Home they discovered that it is a home where people can go and live if they are lonely,or in need of help of any kind,or if they can no longer manage to look after themselves.
